t: Customer Issue - Model set with missing parts?
s: All decent model makers (Lego, Knex, Meccano, Airfix, Revell, Tamiya) will supply spare parts straight to the consumer if a part is missing - it happens sometimes. The chinese makers of copies and similar products, and the cheaper brands of model kits do not offer this though.

t: Item missing/damaged from Amazon order? Steps to quickly contact support to get a replacement
s: October 18, 2020 - Items are missing or damaged from your Amazon order? Here are how you can contact Customer Support to get replacement items. It's very easy to contact the support and they are super fast in resolving the issues

Sorry that you had an issue with your order. The simplest and quickest method for resolving this issue is to request a return (missing pieces). The Seller should either authorize the return and provide a prepaid label of issue a full refund (within 48 hours), they might offer to send the pieces.

t: The Missing Piece: Jordan Stephens, Beth Suzanna: 9781526618139: Amazon.com: Books
s: A heart-warming, fresh and original ... from brand-new picture book author, writer and performer Jordan Stephens.Sunny loves jigsaw puzzles – the bigger the better.
